name: Hand-painted Fox Wall Decor
description:
I always wished my forest friends could come visit me in my home, so I made my dream come true! Now you can Decorate your walls with this jumping fox that i illustrated and lasercut from a Cherry wood then lovingly hand painted. While this little woodland print would be right at home in a nursery or Childs bedroom his adorable face makes him perfect for just about anywhere. 

He is happy to jump over the books on your shelf or the lamp on your nightstand. He easily attaches to any wall by way of the non-damaging-easily-removeable mounting strips he will bring with him when he arrives at your home.

Size: 14.5" x 7.75" (35cm x 20cm) about a quarter inch thick
Mounting strips are included

ships in a well padded box to arrive safely at your home!

name: Wise Owl Illustrated Wall Decor
description:
Decorate your walls with this very wise owl that I illustrated and lasercut from a Cherry wood. While this little woodland print would be right at home in a nursery or Childs' bedroom. His super cute glasses fanned out feathers make him perfect for just about anywhere. 

He is happy to watch over the books on your shelf, fly above the lamp on your nightstand or just look adorable over your sofa. He easily attaches to any wall by way of the non-damaging-easily-removeable mounting strips he will bring with him when he arrives at your home.

Size: 14.5" x 6" (35cm x 19cm) about a quarter inch thick
Mounting strips are included

name: mini animal snowflake gift tags & ornaments {series 2}
description:
A set of 4 miniature Holiday ornaments for your christmas projects and DIY gift wrapping.

Series 2 is brand new for 2013 and are based on the same great designs of the large animal snowflake ornaments. These mini versions can be used on all of your holiday projects!

These little guys look great tied to a package as a gift tag, a seasonal wine bottle charm.  A fun way to fancy up any giftwrap! You can also write upon these with a permanent marker to make gift giving a little more fun!

This DIY set includes: 
• 4 mini animal snowflake ornaments
(Cat • Bunny • Bird • Whale)
• A big length of bakers twine in assorted colors!
• packaged in a little cotton bag

Size: each ornament is approx 1.75" x 1.75"
Materials: Acrylic & twine

name: Cat Snowflake Ornament
description:
The newest peppersprouts snowflake ornament for 2013 is the Kitty Cat! Cat lovers rejoice in the holiday season with a Cat Animal snowflake ornament. 

This minimal take on the classic snowflake holiday ornament is approximately 4 inches in diameter (10cm) and made of 3mm white acrylic.

Each ornament comes with a length of Bakers twine to hang your woodland snowflake from your tree, window, rearview mirror, or anywhere else you decide to add a little snow.

These little snowflakes would also make wonderful gift tags for your holiday presents, or even tied to a bottle of wine. Perfect for cat lovers, or just adding the newest ornament to your animal snowflake collection.

name: Painted Acorn Brooch
description:
This little Acorn and leaf brooch is the perfect size for your favorite cardigan, blazer, bag or coat! This small pin helps make every journey feel like a walk in the woods. 

Made from cherry wood, hand painted and sealed for protection. This little acorn is okay being caught in a light rain, but isn't a fan of the bathtub.

Each brooch has a little hand painted leaf, in a variety of fall colors. I love to mix new colors so each brooch is a little different and an exciting surprise when it arrives in the mail. 

Size: 1.75" x 1.75" (5cm x 5cm)
Leaf color: Assorted Autumn Colors

Material: Cherry wood with a metal clasp pinback
packaged on a little card in a muslin bag - ready for gift giving or adding to your own collection.

name: Painted Wood Fox Brooch
description:
This little red and white fox brooch is the perfect size for your favorite cardigan, blazer, bag or coat! An affordable and easy way to spice up your wardrobe! 

Made from cherry wood, hand painted and sealed for protection. This little fox is okay with a light rain drizzle, but isn't a fan of the bathtub.

Size: 1.75" x 2" (5cm x 4cm)
Material: Cherry wood with a metal clasp pinback
packaged on a little card in a muslin bag - ready for gift giving or adding to your own collection. 

These little guys also look great on top of a holiday gift box as an extra special surprise.

name: Woodland Advent Calendar
description:
Countdown to Christmas with the Through the Woods Advent Calendar. Featuring 25 hand-stamped cotton bags and 25 adorable wood ornaments. 
To start this new tradition or rekindle memories of your own childhood christmas countdown, simply hang the cotton twine under your mantle or really anywhere you wish to spread some christmas cheer. Place one ornament  in each cotton bag & tie the bags to the twine. Each day open one & hang the enclosed ornament on your Christmas tree. This Christmas Ornament Advent Calendar can be used year after year. Ornaments are approximately 2" x 2" (5cm x 5cm). 

Advent Calendar Set Includes:
• 25 Hand-Stamped numbered cotton draw string bags 
• 25 Wood Ornaments
• 25 Lengths of Bakers Twine for the Ornaments
• 10ft Natural Cotton Twine
• Packaged for safe keeping after the holidays.

The illustrated ornaments included are:Christmas Present
Bird House, Mitten, Bunny Rabbit, Snowman, Garden Snail, Vintage Ornament, Song Bird, Christmas Tree, Polar Bear, Squirrel, Acorn, Barn Owl, Snowflake, Hedgehog, Mushroom, Deer, Stocking, Goose, Forest Trees, Fox, Oak Leak, Holly, Mouse, Merry Christmas Ornament

name: Bamboo Christmas Gift Tags - Set of 9
description:
Add some style & personailty to your holiday packages and gifts this year with our bamboo gift tags. Perfect for that extra special package or just a fun and unique way to add a finishing touch to a hostess gift. Heck they can event be hung from your tree or wreath as a decoration. You can write on the back with a ball point pen or let the tag speak for itself. 

Packaged in a cute drawstring cotton bag.
Set includes 9 gift tags:

2 — Happy Holidays Flags — 3.5" x .75" (9cm x 2cm)
2 — Merry Christmas Tags — 3.25" x 1.25" (8cm x 3 cm)
2 — Joy Square Tags — 1.5" x 1.5" (4cm x 4cm)
3 — Cheers Round Tags — 2" dia. (6cm dia.)
Includes 36" of Bakers Twine

Don't worry if your not martha stewart when it comes to wrapping presents. These modern lasercut gift tags will make any gift stand out under the tree. 

Made form eco-friendly Bamboo.

name: mini animal snowflake gift tags & ornaments {series 1}
description:
A set of 4 miniature ornaments for you holiday projects and presents!

Based on the same great designs of the large ornaments these mini versions can be used on all of your holiday projects!

These little guys look great tied to a package as a gift tag, a seasonal wine bottle charm, A cute adornment on a christmas wreath, or a simple christmas ornament for your miniature tree. A fun way to fancy up any giftwrap! You can also write upon these with a permanent marker to make gift giving a little more fun!

This DIY set includes: 
• 4 mini animal snowflake ornaments
( Deer • Polar Bear • Fox • Squirrel )
• A big length of bakers twine in assorted colors!
• packaged in a little cotton bag

Size: each ornament is approx 1.75" x 1.75"
Materials: Acrylic & ribbon

name: Writeable Cheese Markers
description:
Good cheese deserves to be recognized.
Why not bring a few smiles to your next wine and cheese party with this set of 6 cheese markers from Peppersprouts.com. These acrylic cheese markers will keep your guests informed about your cheese choices with their names, and animal origin.  

With the included marker you can write the name of your favorite fromage anywhere on the silhouette shape and simply place into the top of your plated cheese. When the party is over simply wipe with a paper towel and wash with soap and water. 

Good design and good cheese should never be kept apart.

Set of 6 (2 of each animal)
Material: Acrylic
Size: 2in x 1.75in (50mm x 44mm)

name: Our Night Sky Wood Constellation Coasters
description:
Ever wished you could gaze at the stars without leaving your couch? Or maybe you've found yourself wondering, "How many stars make up Cassiopeia?" while sipping on your morning coffee. Bring the star gazing into your living room (or any room for that matter) with a set of "Our Night Sky" Constellation coasters. 

With this set of 4 wooden coasters you can be sure to add a little bit of fancy under that refreshing drink. And spruce up your table and home. They also make the perfect housewarming gift!

Based off astronomical charts the main stars have been cut away from the wood while the connecting lines and smaller stars have been etched into the coasters to mimic modern star charts. The coasters have been laser cut from cherry wood, sanded, and hand rubbed with tung oil to protect them.

This set of coasters contains 4 coasters featuring the following constellations:
Ursa Major
Ursa Minor
Cassiopeia 
Orion

Size: 3.4" x 3.4" and approx .25" thick. 
Material: Cherry Wood

Super cute constellation galaxy coasters sure do make are sure to make any drink look amazing.
Perfect for a new couple, hostess gift or a great housewarming gift!

name: Take a Seat Coasters
description:
Everyone can use an extra chair for those unexpected guests!

With this set of 4 wooden coasters you can be sure to add a little bit of fancy under that refreshing drink. And maybe even spruce up your table and home. Perfect housewarming gift!

The hand drawn chairs have been etched on the surface of the wood while little pieces have been cut away for very fun look. . The coasters have been laser cut from cherry wood, that has been hand rubbed with tung oil to protect them.

This set of coasters contains 4 coasters, each one has a different chair.

Size: 3.4" x 3.4" and approx .25" thick. 
Material: Cherry

name: Home Sweet Home Coasters
description:
No matter where you live, it always feels good to go home. 

With this set of 4 wooden coasters you can be sure to add a little bit of fancy under that refreshing drink. And maybe even spruce up your table and home. Perfect housewarming gift!

The hand drawn houses have been etched on the surface of the wood and someone has gone and cut out all if the windows. The coasters have been laser cut from cherry wood, that has been hand rubbed with tung oil to protect them. 

This set of coasters contains 4 coasters, each one has a different house. 

Size: 3.4" x 3.4" and approx .25" thick.
Material: Cherry MDF

name: Classic Silhouette Wood Coasters
description:
With this set of 4 wooden coasters you can be sure to add a little bit of fancy under that refreshing drink. And maybe even spruce up your table and home.

The hand drawn silhouettes have been cut from the wood and the fancy ornate frame was engraved into the surface of the wood. The coasters have been laser cut from Colour Rimu wood, that has been hand rubbed with tung oil to protect them from water damage. Easy to clean, just wipe with soap and water.

This set of coasters contains one coaster of each silhouetted figure. 

Size: 3.4" x 3.4" and approx .25" thick.
Material: Cherry MDF

name: Song Bird Coasters
description:
Tweet Tweet! These little birdies are waiting to hang out on your favorite table.

With this set of 4 wooden coasters you can be sure to add a little bit of whimsy under that refreshing drink. And maybe even spruce up your table and home.

The ornate designs or twirls and swirls have been engraved onto the surface of these wood coasters, while some dots, leaves, branches, and stars have been cut out making for a very lovely 3 dimensional object. The coasters have been laser cut from a cherry wood, that has been hand rubbed with tung oil to protect them from water over time. 

These little birdies are sitting on a branch, waiting to be sitting in your home.Perfect for a new couple, or a great housewarming gift!

This set of coasters contains four coasters of the same design.

Size: 3.75" diameter and approx .25" thick.
Material: Cherry Wood

name: 50 State Plants Tea Towel - Bold Peach
description:
My dad always said, "You learn something new everyday." So why not brush up on some state trivia while your whipping up a fantastic meal in the kitchen. This brand new nature design pairs perfectly with our 50 state animal towels! Flora and Fauna in your very own Kitchen!

These printed Tea Towels feature a plant from each one of our 50 states. Find out if your state is represented by your state tree or flower! Made from 100% cotton these towels will keep you entertained and absorbent.

Color: Off white with Bold Feverish Peach 
Size: 20" x 36" (.5m x 1m) 
Material: 100% cotton flour sack towel 
Care Instructions printed on packaging

Please see my other listings for the same design in Purple. Or corresponding Animal tea towels!

description:

Color: Off white with Wisteria Purple Lavender Ink

Material: 100% cotton flour sack towel 
Care Instructions printed on packaging

In case you hadn't noticed by now, I love Silhouettes.

Also available in Bold Peach. Pairs nicely with out 50 State Animal Tea towels!

name: Snow Bunny - Ornament
description:
I'm dreaming of a white Christmas, just like the one's I used to know. And I know I can't be the only one.

But just in case your winter wonderland isn't exactly white, one of these modern snow bunny snowflakes should do the trick.

This minimal take on the classic snowflake holiday ornament is approximately 4 inches in diameter (10cm) and made of 3mm white acrylic.

Each ornament  comes with a length of ribbon to hang your woodland snowflake from your tree, window, rearview mirror, or anywhere else you decide to add a little snow.

These little snowflakes would also make wonderful gift tags for your holiday presents, or even tied to a bottle of wine.

name: Whale snowflake ornament
description:
New for 2012! I added a whale to our growing collection of animal snowflake ornaments. I'm dreaming of a white Christmas, just like the one's I used to know. And I know I can't be the only one.

But just in case your winter wonderland isn't exactly white, one of these modern whale nautical snowflakes should do the trick.

This minimal take on the classic snowflake holiday ornament is approximately 4 inches in diameter (10cm) and made of 3mm white acrylic.

Each ornament comes with a length of bakers twine to hang your animal snowflake from your tree, window, rearview mirror, or anywhere else you decide to add a little snow.

These little snowflakes would also make wonderful gift tags for your holiday presents, or even tied to a bottle of wine.

SIZE: 4 inches in diameter (10cm) 
MATERIAL: 3mm white acrylic.

name: Bookshelf Bookplate Stamp
description:
Illustrated for my other brand, the chatty press, this a great gift idea for little bookworms, or to give your favorite teacher so they can stamp each book in their classroom library. 

This Rubber stamp Bookplate is made of High-quality, commercial-grade red rubber and perfectly mounted to a wood block. Made to last for years, so they can keep stamping as their library grows. 

Size: 2" x 2" (5cm x 5cm) 

*Ink not included

description:

name: 5x7 Serif Typography Wall Art
description:
Are you a Typophile? Do you know someone who is?

Well if Sand, ComicSans, and Papyrus drive you mad too, these classic typefaces will look perfect on your wall.

Set in Times, Garamond, Copperplate and Bodoni. This wall hanging has been cut from a light-weight Walnut laminated MDF. 

This graphic designers dream measures in at 7 x 5 inches and 1/4" thick. This little guy is the mini version of our original large design and comes in a good looking sans serif version as well. 

Size: 5x7in
Material: Walnut wood
Thickness: .25in (5mm)

This piece comes unframed but will fit into any standard 5x7 frame (looks amazing without the glass). Or of course you can hang directly on the wall with two tiny finishing nails in each corner. 

The perfect gift for font lover in your life, or maybe even your office!

name: 5x7 Sans Serif Typography Wall Art
description:
***CURRENTLY SHIPPING AT THE END OF OCTOBER **

Are you a Typophile? Do you know someone who is?

Well if Sand, ComicSans, and Papyrus drive you mad too, these classic typefaces will look perfect on your wall.

Set in Helvetica, Century Gothic, Futura, and Gill Sans. This wall hanging has been cut from a light-weight Walnut laminated MDF. 

This graphic designers dream measures in at 7 x 5 inches and 1/4" thick. This little guy is the mini version of our original large design and comes in a good looking serif version as well. 

Size: 5x7in
Material: Walnut wood
Thickness: .25in (5mm)

This piece comes unframed but will fit into any standard 5x7 frame (looks amazing without the glass). Or of course you can hang directly on the wall with two tiny finishing nails in each corner. 

The perfect gift for font lover in your life, or maybe even your office!

name: Wood Wall Art: Time is Swift
description:
"“Time is swift, it races by; Opportunities are born and die... Still you wait and will not try - A bird with wings who dares not rise and fly.”

Inspired by an A. A. Milne quote (author of such classics as Winnie-the-Pooh) this little piece of wall art is waiting to be taken home. 

This sleek design has been cut from a piece of cherry wood and fits perfectly in any standard 5x7 frame. When put in a thicker shadowbox frame this piece can cast a beautiful silhouetted shadow onto your wall.

Size: 5x7in
Material: Cherry Wood
Thickness: .25in (5mm) 

This piece comes unframed but will fit into any standard 5x7 frame (looks amazing without the glass)

name: The Forest Floor - Wood Wall Art 5x7
description:
Beneath the tall towering mushrooms, a little cottage hides among the grass. Perhaps Alice will soon stop by on another trip to Wonderland.

This new sleek design has been cut from a piece of cherry wood and fits perfectly in any open back 5x7 frame. When put in a thicker shadowbox frame this piece can cast a beautiful silhouetted shadow onto your wall. 

Size: 5x7in
Material: Cherry Wood
Thickness: .25in (5mm) 

This piece comes unframed but will fit into any standard 5x7 frame (looks amazing without the glass). Or of course you can hang directly on the wall with two tiny finishing nails in each corner. 

This is the third in an expanding series of affordable art pieces that will be growing over the summer months! I can't wait to share more with you!

name: Wood Wall Art: Deer in the Forest
description:
A mother deer and fawn travel through the forest. Trotting over rolling hills and playing what seems to be a game of hide-and-seek behind the tree trunks. 

This new sleek design has been cut from a piece of cherry wood and fits perfectly in any standard 5x7 frame. When put in a thicker shadowbox frame this piece can cast a beautiful silhouetted shadow onto your wall. 

Size: 5x7in
Material: Cherry Wood
Thickness: .25in (5mm) 

This piece comes unframed but will fit into any standard 5x7 frame (looks amazing without the glass)

This is the second in an expanding series of affordable art pieces that will be growing over the summer months! I can't wait to share more with you

name: Dachshund and Scarf Pin - Wood Brooch
description:
An adorable Dachshund pin in cherry wood by peppersprouts.

Dachshunds are adorable, but a wiener dog all cozy and warm for winter is even cuter!
As the weather gets cool this happy illustrated dog wood pin is a perfect way to spice up your sweater, blazer, bag or coat! An affordable and easy way to spice up your wardrobe! These little guys also look great on top of a holiday gift box as an extra special surprise. They also make a great stocking stuffer. Perfect for every dog lover on your list.

Dachsund and Scarf Pin
Size: 2.8" x 1.3" (7cm x 4cm)
Material: Cherry wood, metal pinback

name: Barn Owl Pin - Wood Brooch
description:
An adorable Owl pin in cherry wood by peppersprouts.

As the weather gets cool this Barn Owl wood brooch is a perfect way to spice up your sweater, blazer, bag or coat! Put a bird on it of course! An affordable and easy way to spice up your wardrobe! These little guys also look great on top of a holiday gift box as an extra special surprise. They also make a great stocking stuffer. 

Owl Pin
Size: 1.25" x 2" (2cm x 5cm)
Material: Cherry wood, metal pinback

name: Whale Pin - Wood Brooch
description:
An adorable whale pin in cherry wood by peppersprouts.

As the weather gets cool this Barn Owl wood brooch is a perfect way to spice up your sweater, blazer, bag or coat! An affordable and easy way to spice up your wardrobe! These little guys also look great on top of a holiday gift box as an extra special surprise. They also make a great stocking stuffer. Let's explore the ocean together!

Owl Pin
Size: 1.25" x 2" (2cm x 5cm)
Material: Cherry wood, metal pinback

name: Deer Pin- Wood Brooch
description:
An adorable deer pin in cherry wood by peppersprouts.

As the weather gets cool this woodland inspired wood pin is a perfect way to spice up your sweater, blazer, bag or coat! An affordable and easy way to spice up your wardrobe! These little guys also look great on top of a holiday gift box as an extra special surprise. They also make a great stocking stuffer.

Woodland Deer Wood Brooch
Size: 2" x 2" (5cm x 5cm)
Material: Cherry wood, metal pinback

name: Geometric Petals Bamboo Earrings
description:
I love experimenting with shapes and patterns. This off-centered design was inspired by my youthful memory of picking the petals off wildflowers to discover if my schoolgirl crush loved me back.

Laser cut from bamboo, these floral inspired earrings are environmentally friendly and light as a feather. You can wear this unique design on a day-to-day basis without your ears ever feeling weighed down. Featuring hand hammered Sterling Silver (.925) ear hooks, these nature inspired accessories are as unique as you are.

Earrings come packaged on a super fun folding card that I designed to match the earrings, and is lovingly placed inside a kraft paper box. These geometric earrings make a unique gift or perhaps just a special treat for yourself.

Material: Lightweight Eco-Friendly Bamboo
Earhook: Hand-hammered Sterling Silver 
Size: 1in x 1.5in (23mm x 40mm) (not including hook)

name: Whale of a Tale Bamboo Earrings
description:
Inspired by my own adventures on the Maine Coast, these cheerful whales are ready to swim away with you on your next adventure. 

This pair of delightful whale friends were sketched on paper, scanned into my computer and then carefully composed to create a wearable illustration. 

Lasercut from bamboo, these nautically inspired earrings are environmental friendly and light as a feather. You can wear these bold designs on a day-to-day basis without your ears ever feeling weighed down. Featuring hand hammered Sterling Silver (.925) ear hooks, these nature inspired accessories are as unique as you.

Earrings come packaged on a super fun folding card, that I designed to match the earrings, inside a kraft box. These smiling whales are ready for gift giving, or just a great way to treat yourself.


Material: Lightweight Eco-Friendly Bamboo
Earhook: Hand-hammered Sterling Silver 
Size: 1in x 1.3in (25mm x 35mm) (not including hook)

name: Forest Deer Bamboo Earrings
description:
Growing up, I loved the mornings my dad would take a detour through the state park where we would stop and watch the deer graze in the large grassy field. That wonderful memory inspired me to create these graceful deer earrings that are ready to frolic with you wherever you decide to go. 

This pair of peaceful fawn friends were sketched on paper, scanned into my computer and then carefully composed to create a wearable illustration. 

Lasercut from bamboo, these woodland inspired earrings are environmental friendly and light as a feather. You can wear these bold designs on a day-to-day basis without your ears ever feeling weighed down. Featuring hand hammered Sterling Silver (.925) ear hooks, these nature inspired accessories are as unique as you.

Earrings come packaged on a super fun folding card, that I designed to match the earrings, inside a kraft box. These easy-going deer make a perfect gift or just a great way to treat yourself.


Material: Lightweight Eco-Friendly Bamboo
Earhook: Hand-hammered Sterling Silver 
Size: 1in x 1.4in (27mm x 35mm)

name: Perched Bird Bamboo Earrings
description:
Whether living in a studio apartment in Brooklyn or a town house on the Maine Coast, I have always been enchanted by the tweets and chips of local birds when I opened my window. Their morning melodies inspired me to create these simple bird silhouette earrings. They are sure to have you whistling a happy tune all day long.

Lasercut from bamboo, these woodland inspired earrings are environmentally friendly and light as a feather. You can wear this unique design on a day-to-day basis without your ears ever feeling weighed down. Featuring hand hammered Sterling Silver (.925) ear hooks, these nature inspired accessories are as unique as you are.

Earrings come packaged on a super fun folding card, that I designed to match the earrings, inside a kraft box. These easy-going feathered friends make a perfect gift or just special treat for yourself.


Material: Lightweight Eco-Friendly Bamboo
Earhook: Hand-hammered Sterling Silver 
Size: 1in x 1.5in (25mm x 40mm) (not including hook)

name: Bridget the bunny wood brooch
description:
Bridget the Bunny pin
Size: 1.5" x 2"
Material: Cherry wood

Brand New for the holiday season! Originally just a pencil sketch of mine, Bridget the BUnny and her little gang of friends have been transformed into a laser cut brooch. Perfect to adorn your sweater, jacket, bag, or just about anywhere!

Bridget is ready for a night out with you, or even just a day on campus, with her little sting of pearls, and cute little hair bow!

Because wood is a natural material keep in mind your brooch will vary slightly in it's grain pattern!

Each pin comes on a paper card ready for gift giving, or just keeping for yourself! This little guy would be the perfect unexpected stocking stuffer for that special someone on your list!

* the last photo shows all four pins available in this series

name: Sans Serif Typography Wall Art
description:
Are you a Typophile? Do you know someone who is?

Well if Sand, ComicSans, and Papyrus drive you up the wall too, these classic typefaces will look perfect on your wall.

Set in Helvetica, Gill Sans Light, Century Gothic, Verdana, Univers Light, and Arial Black. 

Easy to hang from Two small finishing nails.

Size: 15" x 14.25" (38cm x 36cm) and 1/4" thick (6.4mm)
Material: Dark Walnut
